alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 20 at 4:15PM HST until November 21 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A large north-northwest (340 degrees) swell will bring dangerously high surf to exposed north facing shores, and high surf to west facing shores. The swell will gradually diminish and turn more northerly on Tuesday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 12 to 16 feet across north facing shores of the Big Island. * WHERE...Big Island East and Big Island North. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Big Island East; Big Island North
